Stand on the edge of discovery

Go further with postgraduate study at Te Herenga Waka—Victoria University of Wellington.

Learn more

Discover your next step, pursue your passions, grow your career, or refine your expertise through postgraduate study. Create your future at Aotearoa's #1 University for intensity of high-quality research.

Study full-time or part-time towards certificates, diplomas, Honours, Masters, and PhDs across nine Faculties.

Search for postgraduate programmes
